attributes.action: The UK Government had recognized the head of the Imperial House of Brazil.
attributes.additional_details: The Bragança royal family are the founders of independent, sovereign, legitimate, imperial Brazil. Dom Pedro I was hailed by Brazil as an imperator of the people, the military and the Parliament of the time. The descendants of Dom Pedro I to this day have been fulfilling the legacy of serving the Brazilian nation at any time and place.
attributes.background: The British government had recognized the head of the imperial house of brazil as the head of State of Brazil. He is currently Dom Luis of Orleans and Bragança
